TypeSignature.Value: .class public interface auto ansi abstract IAtomicGroupStateProvider implements class System.Fabric.IStateProvider

summary.para: Describes additional methods of the interface that a user service must implement to take advantage of the atomic group functionality of a service group.

MemberSignature.Value: public System.Threading.Tasks.Task AtomicGroupCommitAsync (long atomicGroupId, long commitSequenceNumber, System.Threading.CancellationToken cancellationToken);

.method public hidebysig newslot virtual instance class System.Threading.Tasks.Task AtomicGroupCommitAsync(int64 atomicGroupId, int64 commitSequenceNumber, valuetype System.Threading.CancellationToken cancellationToken) cil managed

param.name: atomicGroupId
param.para: The ID of the group to be committed.

param.name: commitSequenceNumber
param.para: The sequence number for the commit operation.

param.name: cancellationToken
param.para: The object that the operation is observing. It can be used to send a notification that the operation should be canceled. Note that cancellation is advisory and that the operation might still be completed even if it is canceled.

MemberSignature.Value: public System.Threading.Tasks.Task AtomicGroupRollbackAsync (long atomicGroupId, long rollbackSequenceNumber, System.Threading.CancellationToken cancellationToken);

.method public hidebysig newslot virtual instance class System.Threading.Tasks.Task AtomicGroupRollbackAsync(int64 atomicGroupId, int64 rollbackSequenceNumber, valuetype System.Threading.CancellationToken cancellationToken) cil managed

param.name: atomicGroupId
param.para: The ID of the group to roll back.

param.name: rollbackSequenceNumber
param.para: The sequence number for the rollback operation.

param.name: cancellationToken
param.para: The object that the operation is observing. It can be used to send a notification that the operation should be canceled. Note that cancellation is advisory and that the operation might still be completed even if it is canceled.

summary.para: Rolls back a particular atomic group.

MemberSignature.Value: public System.Threading.Tasks.Task AtomicGroupUndoProgressAsync (long fromCommitSequenceNumber, System.Threading.CancellationToken cancellationToken);

.method public hidebysig newslot virtual instance class System.Threading.Tasks.Task AtomicGroupUndoProgressAsync(int64 fromCommitSequenceNumber, valuetype System.Threading.CancellationToken cancellationToken) cil managed

param.name: fromCommitSequenceNumber
param.para: The LSN of a commit operation. All progress past this point should be undone.

param.name: cancellationToken
param.para: The object that the operation is observing. It can be used to send a notification that the operation should be canceled. Note that cancellation is advisory and that the operation might still be completed even if it is canceled.

summary.para: Indicates that progress beyond a particular commit sequence number that is provided via should be undone.
